definition: to examine tiny clues to know general trends (idiom)/to deduce the whole story from small traces
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
